name: GetCompanySuiRates
description:
Retrieve company SUI rates for specific criteria.

Use this tool to get all company State Unemployment Insurance (SUI) rates. You can filter the results by company, payroll state authority tax code, or effective date. This is secured by the Tax Filing/W-2s process and is applicable for USA Payroll.

parameters.name: company_reference_ids
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of company reference IDs or WIDs representing one or more companies.

value_schema.description: The company reference ID or WID that represents 1 or more companies. Example: company=comp1&company=comp2&company=cb550da820584750aae8f807882fa79a

parameters.name: effective_date_for_sui_rate
parameters.description: Date for the SUI rate to be effective, in yyyy-mm-dd format.

value_schema.description: The effective date for the SUI rate, using the yyyy-mm-dd format.

parameters.name: maximum_number_of_objects
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of objects in the response, between 1 and 100. The default is 20.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

parameters.name: response_offset_index
parameters.description: Specifies the starting point of objects in the response. Default is 0. Used with 'limit' to control paging.

value_schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

parameters.name: state_authority_tax_code
parameters.description: The FIPS code or WID for one or more states to filter SUI rates. Separate multiple codes with '&'.

value_schema.description: The FIPS code or WID that represents 1 or more states. Example: payrollStateAuthorityTaxCode=06&payrollStateAuthorityTaxCode=3b3d378d5f4a48b8b3ac46fee0703226&payrollStateAuthorityTaxCode=48

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Workday API

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: The company reference ID or WID that represents 1 or more companies. Example: company=comp1&company=comp2&company=cb550da820584750aae8f807882fa79a

value_schema.description: The company reference ID or WID that represents 1 or more companies. Example: company=comp1&company=comp2&company=cb550da820584750aae8f807882fa79a

parameters.name: effective
parameters.description: The effective date for the SUI rate, using the yyyy-mm-dd format.

value_schema.description: The effective date for the SUI rate, using the yyyy-mm-dd format.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

value_schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

parameters.name: payrollStateAuthorityTaxCode
parameters.description: The FIPS code or WID that represents 1 or more states. Example: payrollStateAuthorityTaxCode=06&payrollStateAuthorityTaxCode=3b3d378d5f4a48b8b3ac46fee0703226&payrollStateAuthorityTaxCode=48

value_schema.description: The FIPS code or WID that represents 1 or more states. Example: payrollStateAuthorityTaxCode=06&payrollStateAuthorityTaxCode=3b3d378d5f4a48b8b3ac46fee0703226&payrollStateAuthorityTaxCode=48

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
